club.helpCommand:
Club commands:
/stats - server stats
/token - your token
/monster - enable the SUPERCITY RAMPAGE mode in the gameroom.
/pro - some info about prostatus
/boxes - get information about boxes
/prohelp - commands for pro-status holders!
/bonus - get a daily bonus.
/promo [promo] - enter a promo code for PRO-STATUS!
club.proStatusHelp:
Commands for pro-status:
/theme - change the background in the main menu
club.surgebothello:
Welcome to the club! I am SurgeBot! Your faithful assistant!
Type "/help" to find out about all commands!

inbox:
UPDATE FROM 11/09/21:
Improved account security
Improved offers.
Now skins must be obtained from boxes.
Added translation into English and Ukrainian.
Now game modes change every hour.

CLIENT UPDATE FROM 09/11/21:
Now the "Play" button takes you IMMEDIATELY INTO BATTLE!
Added useful information on the top left (near the trophy road)
Added 2 new backgrounds for PRO-STATUS!

UPDATE FROM 08/19/21:
Now you can see when the user was online in the club.
The game will warn you 5 minutes before maintenance.
Added promo code system.

UPDATE FROM 07/25/21:
When you click on the Play button, you are thrown into the gameroom.
